name: Real parking in ghost town Pro
name_original: Real parking in ghost town Pro
description:
《Real parking 》 is a game for simulate a real parking .realistic car environment and variety of simulated weather environment.After completed the task in the game,you can playback the whole process of driving,in order you can review your control process clearly. Because of easy manipulation.For the sake of easy control and convenient moving,the game car uses automatic .Because there is no extra perspective in the whole game,you can only accomplish the task by observing the mirror.Of course, you can also walk outside the car to observe.There is no limit time in the game ,so it is suitable to a novice for practice .
PS:Personal writing skills are not very good,please do not tangle in the instructions.Download the game and play ,you will know.^_^
Video:https://youtu.be/W9DnZJpVirA
4.1
1. Add Gravity Sensing Control.
2. Repair the scene 2.
4.0
1. Add a new training scene, you can practice reverse stall parking，side parking, etc..
2. Optimize the scene display
3. fix known bugs.
